messages.subject: FW: care package for dana and family
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, Below is a message I received from an off-list friend of Dana s, in case anyone is looking for specific ways to help her through losing her child. Pam
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

Below is a message I received from an off-list friend of Dana's, in case
anyone is looking for specific ways to help her through losing her child.

Pam
----------

From: Bellumswife77@...
To: Lucinas-Lagoon-owner@yahoogroups.com
Subject: care package for dana and family
Date: Sun, Jul 21, 2002, 3:49 PM


hi,

i don't belong to your lists, but am a friend of dana and her family. would
you be so kind as to pass this on to your lists?please let me know.

thanks


i know that there nothing is we could give the hoffman-wilson family to make
up for their loss, but i have decided to make a care package for all of
them.

matt, dana, lauren and ema.
those of you living in montana may wish to send a letter or package from
there, but my hope is to have a package full of joyful oddities for all of
them. hopefully it will bring a little bit of sunshine and joy to them,
espeically knowing how much everyone is thinking of and praying for them.
perhaps you would like to make or buy something or send a letter. i will be
sending out care packages via fedex this friday (if there is enough stuff,
or

monday)and next friday or the following monday. whatever you send to me, i
will pass on to their family. you may of course contact me via phone or
email
my address is:
stefanie stringfellow
912 desota ln
oak grove ky 42262
my phone number is: 270.439.1170

love,
stefanie
